cyclone.name: HANNA
cyclone.current_location: about 530 mi ESE of Port O’Connor, Texas
cyclone.trajectory: tracking west-northwest across the north-western Gulf of Mexico toward the central-southern Texas coast
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: central Texas coast near Matagorda/Port O’Connor

weather_observation.watch_coast: Port Mansfield to High Island, TX
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Texas coast and adjacent north-western Gulf; lesser effects along Louisiana coastline
weather_observation.wind: Tropical-storm-force winds are unlikely; probability <5% for 34-kt winds
weather_observation.storm_surge: Minor swell and rip-current risk along southeast Louisiana coast; surge heights not expected to reach 3 ft
weather_observation.rainfall: Periods of heavy rain with totals generally 1–3 in., isolated 4 in. possible
weather_observation.other_hazards: Dangerous surf and rip currents that could temporarily disrupt port vessel traffic
